targets.query: SELECT last("utilization") FROM "autogen"."xr_np_load_stats" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Hostname$/ AND "node_name" =~ /^$LineCard$/ AND "np_name" =~ /^$NP_ID$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "node_name", "np_name", "source" fill(null)

panels.description: # show platform software status control-processor brief
panels.title: CPU Utilization - $Hostname

targets.query: SELECT last("total_cpu_five_minute") FROM "xr_cpu_stats" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source" fill(null)
SELECT last("total_cpu_five_minute") FROM "xr_cpu_stats" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source" fill(null)

panels.description: # show platform software status control-processor brief
panels.title: Memory Utilization - $Hostname

panels.description: # show platform software status control-processor brief
panels.title: System Power Statistics - $Hostname

targets.query: SELECT last("fan_speed") AS "fan_speed" FROM "autogen"."xr_chassis_stats" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$device$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "location" fill(null) LIMIT 1

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last(/error|drop/), 10s) FROM "autogen"."xr_if_stats" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$device$/ AND "interface_name" =~ /^$interfaces$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "interface_name", "source" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last(/error|drop/), 10s) FROM "autogen"."xr_if_stats" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$device$/ AND "interface_name" =~ /^$interfaces$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "interface_name", "source" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last(/error|drop/), 10s) FROM "autogen"."xr_if_stats" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$device$/ AND "interface_name" =~ /^$interfaces$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "interface_name", "source" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last(/error|drop/), 10s) FROM "autogen"."xr_if_stats" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$device$/ AND "interface_name" =~ /^$interfaces$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "interface_name", "source" fill(null)

panels.title: Controller - Laser & Optical & Temperature & Voltage Levels

list.query: show tag values from xr_if_stats with key=source

list.definition: show tag values with key = "interface_name" where source=~ /^$Hostname/

list.name: interfaces
list.query: show tag values with key = "interface_name" where source=~ /^$Hostname/

list.definition: show tag values with key = "name" where "name" =~ /Optics/;

list.name: Port
list.query: show tag values with key = "name" where "name" =~ /Optics/;
